languages.text: "У меня есть подозрение, что время и силы Вольного Торговца можно было бы растрачивать более эффективно, чем добывать справки. Впрочем, у Лорд-капитана явно другое мнение на этот счет".
"I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."
languages.original_text: "У меня есть подозрение, что время и силы Вольного Торговца можно было бы растрачивать более эффективно, чем добывать справки. Впрочем, у Лорд-капитана явно другое мнение на этот счет".

traits.locale_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “把行商浪人宝贵的时间和精力浪费在排队领取执照上，我怀疑这并不是什么有效率的做法。但显而易见，舰长大人本人对此有不同的看法。”
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: “把行商浪人宝贵的时间和精力浪费在排队领取执照上，我怀疑这并不是什么有效率的做法。但显而易见，舰长大人本人对此有不同的看法。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je pense que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a d'autres affaires plus urgentes à régler que de faire la queue pour obtenir un certificat quelconque, mais visiblement, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'est pas de cet avis. »
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a d'autres affaires plus urgentes à régler que de faire la queue pour obtenir un certificat quelconque, mais visiblement, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'est pas de cet avis. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sospecho que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente podría dar un uso más productivo a su tiempo y a sus energías que hacer cola para un certificado, pero evidentemente {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán discrepa de mi parecer».
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: «Sospecho que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente podría dar un uso más productivo a su tiempo y a sus energías que hacer cola para un certificado, pero evidentemente {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán discrepa de mi parecer».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「証明書のために列を作るなど、自由開拓者の時間と活力を全く活かせていないと思うが、ロード・キャプテンはこの問題に関して明らかに異質な視点をお持ちなのだな」
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: 「証明書のために列を作るなど、自由開拓者の時間と活力を全く活かせていないと思うが、ロード・キャプテンはこの問題に関して明らかに異質な視点をお持ちなのだな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sich für eine Beglaubigung anzustellen, ist in meinen Augen nicht der effektivste Gebrauch der Zeit und Energie {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Doch der Lord Captain ist da offenkundig anderer Meinung."
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: "Sich für eine Beglaubigung anzustellen, ist in meinen Augen nicht der effektivste Gebrauch der Zeit und Energie {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Doch der Lord Captain ist da offenkundig anderer Meinung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, tasdikname kuyruğunda bekleyerek zamanını ve enerjisini verimsizce harcamamalı. Tabii Lord Kaptan'ın bu konuda farklı bir görüşe sahip olduğu ortada."
languages.original_text: "I suspect that queuing up for a certificate is not the most effective use of the Rogue Trader's time and energy, but the Lord Captain clearly has a different view on the matter."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, sertifika sırasında bekleyerek zamanını ve enerjisini verimsizce harcamamalı. Tabii Lord Kaptan'ın bu konuda farklı bir görüşe sahip olduğu ortada."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
